{{html:
<form class="form-horizontal">
  <fieldset>
    <div id="legend" class="">
      <legend class="">Revert $app to an earlier state</legend>
    </div>
    <div class="control-group">
      <label class="control-label">Point in time</label>
      <div class="controls">
        <select class="input-xlarge" name="$$pointintime">
          <option>5 minutes ago</option>
          <option>15 minutes ago</option>
          <option>30 minutes ago</option>
          <option>45 minutes ago</option>
          <option>1 hour ago</option>
          <option>2 hours ago</option>
          <option>3 hours ago</option>
          <option>4 hours ago</option>
          <option>5 hours ago</option>
          <option>6 hours ago</option>
          <option>7 hours ago</option>
          <option>8 hours ago</option>
          <option>9 hours ago</option>
          <option>10 hours ago</option>
          <option>11 hours ago</option>
          <option>12 hours ago</option>
          <option>13 hours ago</option>
          <option>14 hours ago</option>
          <option>15 hours ago</option>
          <option>16 hours ago</option>
          <option>17 hours ago</option>
          <option>18 hours ago</option>
          <option>19 hours ago</option>
          <option>20 hours ago</option>
          <option>21 hours ago</option>
          <option>22 hours ago</option>
          <option>23 hours ago</option>
          <option>1 day ago</option>
          <option>2 days ago</option>
          <option>3 days ago</option>
          <option>4 days ago</option>
          <option>5 days ago</option>
          <option>6 days ago</option>
          <option>1 week ago</option>
          <option>2 weeks ago</option>
          <option>3 weeks ago</option>
          <option>1 month ago</option>
          <option>2 months ago</option>
          <option>3 months ago</option>
          <option>1 year ago</option>
          <option>2 years ago</option>
        </select>
      </div>
    </div>

    <div class="control-group">
      <label class="control-label">Roll back disks as well</label>
      <div class="controls">
        <label class="checkbox">
          <input type="checkbox" value="Disk $$disk1"> Disk $$disk1
        </label>
        <label class="checkbox">
          <input type="checkbox" value="Disk $$disk2"> Disk $$disk2
        </label>
      </div>
    </div>

    <div class="controls">
      <button class="btn btn-success">Roll back</button>
    </div>

  </fieldset>
</form>
}}
